product.description: This AI-driven MMP (Mobile Measurement Partner) helps businesses transform customer data into powerful insights. It enables detailed tracking of top-performing distribution channels, monitoring every click, download, and onboarding event.

features.name: AI-driven insights
features.description: Leverages artificial intelligence to derive powerful insights from customer data.

features.name: Channel performance tracking
features.description: Monitors and tracks the performance of distribution channels down to granular actions like clicks, downloads, and onboardings.

product.targeted_market: Businesses that rely on mobile user acquisition and marketing, likely app developers, e-commerce platforms, and other companies with a significant mobile presence seeking to optimize their marketing spend and understand customer journeys.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The difficulty in attributing customer acquisition to specific marketing channels and understanding the effectiveness of those channels. It addresses the need for granular data tracking to identify which distribution channels are most successful in driving user acquisition and engagement.
